author.description: Rotten Tomatoes every day.

excerpt: AND THE TOMATO GOES TO… Welcome to RT’s 18th Annual Golden Tomato Awards, which honor the best-reviewed movies and TV shows of 2016. From the biggest Hollywood hits to the most provocative indies, we’ve got the films that won the critics’ hearts — and probably inspired you as well. excerpt: The ultimate critics v fans face-off is coming to San Diego!
